entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
